resources.string:
The __serve side buttons__ indicate 
 
- who should serve 
- from which side (L/R) (badminton, squash, tennis) 
- if the player may serve twice (Ⅱ) or just one more time (Ⅰ) before serve switches to the opponent (table tennis) 

The side or player changes automatically after each point entered. 

If required (but normally it is not), you can toggle side/player by tapping it.

This button will allow you to start a __timer__. 

It will only appear when appropriate 
 
- Between sets 
- Warmup for each set
You can optionally __enter a color__ for both players/teams. \n\nLong click the serve side button to select a color.
The scores of __previous sets__, as well as the difference in points, are visible here. \n\nTap it to see the details of previous sets in a graph.

More options are available from the menu. You can for example: 
 
- Customize appearance and behaviour of the app via 'Settings' 
- Show details of previously reffed matches 
- Start an injury timer 
- Export/import all your reffed matches to/from a zip file 
- Consult an elaborate help page for this app 
- Consult the official racketlon rules
__That\'s it. Enjoy your racketlon.__ \n\nStart a new match by tapping this button.
If player %1$s wins the %2$s he wins the match
Player %1$s needs 1 more point to win
Player %1$s needs %2$s more points to win
Discipline %1$s does not need to be played

- King of Rackets > Semi Finals 
Lukas Windischberger [AUT] - Michi Dickert [AUT] 
Jesper Hougaard (DEN) - Peter Duyck (BEL)
